reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project tackles two central problems in Tunisia: high umemployment among the graduates and the democratization. The beneficiaries of the project are 400 academically trained unemployed from four different parts of Tunisia (Tunis, Jendouba, Kasserine an d Gafsa). The programme aims to improve their chances of finding employment by educating them on the mechanisms of the employment market, different ways of gaining employment and starting their own business. They will also be trained on practical level (de veloping their skills, building a CV, preparing for an interview). The programme also seeks to increase people's awareness of democracy and human rights along with the related concepts, tools and mechanisms. As a result they will gain knowledge on the prin cipals of the democracy (the rights and responsabilities of a citizen, pluralism, free elections and equality between genders).
